description:
Your very own Pirate Radio Station. How cool is that! This is extremely simple hack turns your Raspberry Pi into a powerful FM transmitter, This hack requires absolutely minimum requirements: an SD card, a Piece of Wire and Power source, that's it!

Pi FM Station has powerful range which can easily cover your home, your office and if you are planning to do outside activities , such as organized mountain hike, trip or something else you can take your Pi FM Radio station with you and share with you folks.

I hope you will find this course useful and enjoyable! Check back for a NEW instructions and lessons.

Finally, Thanks to original creators: Oliver Mattos , Oskar Weigl, Ryan Grassel and Wynter Woods, without them this course is impossible! Kudos to you guys!
title: Raspberry Pi Project: FM Radio Station (No Coding Required)
